name: Galactic Sweep
description:
Welcome to the Space Company new employee!

The universe is vast, mysterious and extremely profitable with the right work done. Here at Space Company we need people like you to handle the BIG jobs; talking about the celestial bodies that float around our space like theres nothing that they could be doing for us.

You have been selected for the position of Primary Engager in the P.S.D (Planet Scrapping Division) where you can pick what you work on! From haunted planets to ones made of ice and cheese, each one gets the same treatment by you. You even get rewards for your efforts!

Its time to sweep the galaxy for the right price, and remember;

Space is Company Space.
